org.openide.actions

Class FileSystemAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openide.util.SharedClassObject
      • org.openide.util.actions.SystemAction
        • org.openide.actions.FileSystemAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, Externalizable, Serializable, EventListener, Action, Presenter, Presenter.Menu, Presenter.Popup, ContextAwareAction, HelpCtx.Provider

    public class FileSystemAction
extends SystemAction
implements ContextAwareAction, Presenter.Menu, Presenter.Popup
    Action that presents standard file system-related actions. Listens until a node representing a DataObject is selected and then retrieves SystemActions from its FileSystem.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
